A fuck ton of rocks, 4 friends, 3 fry ups, 1 weekend and a rope bridge. 🌊
#picoftheday… https://t.co/l9GaZDcSAr
Hit some cool landmarks with these girls in the states, now doing the same in Ireland!… https://t.co/df90FSINf6
@chaptersofkat websites around 😂
@chaptersofkat I flew Chicago to Manchester to Dublin for 300 quid! If ya can get a quick changeover it's worth it! 👍🏻 also lots of deal
@chaptersofkat get a flight with another stop 👍🏻
@dorkfaceblog did anyone else read that tweet differently 😂
@KatieAScottx Yeah it made me laugh a few months ago but seriously what's wrong with a bit of gluten. I don't even eat bread everyday xD
@iconiclaur Was awhile ago! Just got reminded of it! Most of our diets should be carbs like, mainly fruit and veg though!
@ThinkLikeKirst Hahahah thanks. It's actually a true story though!
Give my blog a visit at https://t.co/Qsa4bEnZYO and share yours with me! #lbloggers Also follow me on Insta too… https://t.co/KrFhm9d5nV
@Fii__fii It's not the worst for you! But omg this whole #lbloggers chat reminded me of it!
@carpediememmie Stop I love a good ould crisp sandwich! They're the best <3 #lbloggers
@Fii__fii @__Merkabae totally agree. <3
@__Merkabae What I find about youtubers is that you can't say anything on their videos without being attacked cause their fans attack!
Someone once said that I don't eat healthily cause I had bread on a what I ate wednesday blogpost lol #lbloggers
@ofbeautyand @__Merkabae I'm hopeful that they wouldnt cause it makes sense not too. Just keep your blog's dignity like. #lbloggers
@__Merkabae Where have you seen bad tips? If it's big mainstream youtubers a lot of their fans turn against you pretty easily. #lbloggers
@__Merkabae A5. I wouldn't start drama about it. I'd just feel less likely to read the same blog again. #lbloggers
@ofbeautyand @__Merkabae There's very little consequences to telling the truth! I don't think most people would lie! #lbloggers
@__Merkabae A4. I've never had a product completely fail, I've just given both positives and negatives so it is a fair review! #lbloggers
@amreetasagoo @__Merkabae This is why I am so determined to get travel posts up on my blog just to look back on them in years to come. <3
@BeckyBedbug @__Merkabae yeah fair enough! I wonder if I'd learn much if I researched outfit posts! 😂
@BeckyBedbug @__Merkabae theres little need.
@BeckyBedbug @__Merkabae I'd only really do that if I was contemplating working with a company. If I was just showing outfits I put together
@amiehayward @__Merkabae I'm so glad it's never happened to me and that I'm not a trend setter tbh. I'd get so annoyed! #lbloggers
@__Merkabae A3. I don't think I have. I hope not! I probably have written trendy posts but definitely with accuracy! #lbloggers
@amiehayward @__Merkabae I don't get the point in it. Is there many occurences of plagirism in blogging nowadays? #lbloggers
@BeckyBedbug @__Merkabae How could you even research an ootd post like? #lbloggers
@amiehayward @__Merkabae I don't mind as long as their is clearly someone's own opinion and it's their own words. #lbloggers
@__Merkabae A2 Depends on the post. Travel related not much really as it's my own experience but if I'm talking about nutrition I'd do a bit
@SIMPLYAMYUK @__Merkabae @xxxxx haven't been there yet but I think I just do bits in the farm yard part :3 I basically just educate about
@__Merkabae A1. Considering some people who are doing well for themselves started with a blog I'd say blogging has a big impact #lbloggers
@SIMPLYAMYUK good luck with it all! Let us know how it goes! #lbloggers
@SIMPLYAMYUK @__Merkabae @xxxxx I need to go to the Guinness factory some time! The zoo is always cool! I get to work there sometimes for
@Laura_Nolan22 @__Merkabae stop its freezing! I'm good though! Having a chill night! #lbloggers
@PossiblyVintage nice way to spend the evening! I'm stuffed. I don't think I could fit much more in! How's your day been? #lbloggers
@SIMPLYAMYUK I've wanted to change my blog name but I can never think of one and it's also very well established! #lbloggers
@SIMPLYAMYUK @__Merkabae @xxxxx really? What did you get up to here? ❤️ #lbloggers
@SIMPLYAMYUK Are you changing the blog name at all?
@__Merkabae Hey! I'm Ellen from https://t.co/Qsa4bEnZYO . I'm from Ireland and have a travel and lifestyle blog. How is everyone? #lbloggers
@carpediememmie I feel like I have the time but often forget! I'm grand now! Having a chilled out evening! #lbloggers
@PossiblyVintage I really need to do this! I've been missing out! I'm good, just had nice chilli! And you? 😘 #lbloggers
@carpediememmie yay! It's been ages since I've joined in! How're you? #lbloggers
Who is chatting tonight? #lbloggers
Why've I not made chilli before? 😂
When you're reunited with bae but also pissed drunk by the time he arrives at the party!… https://t.co/NbJjlxbnTm
Gonna join in with #lbloggers tonight! It's been too long!
https://t.co/zrYj9HdXBX New travel diary on Louisville KY #thegirlgang @bloggerbees @lbloggerschat #blogginggals https://t.co/bZJ2eDQWcS
@totally_ro okay grand! It still seemed to come up for someone else but thanks 👌🏻
@totally_ro thanks! Btw is my pinned tweet still inappropriate?
Lost like 10 followers for this too 😡
Does anybody know how I can contact Twitter directly?
Really fucking pissed off about it!
Apologies to anybody who may have seen inappropriate tweets from me. My account was hacked.
Seeing my main group of college friends for the first time since I've been home today! 😝
@GrandioseDays sounds exciting! 😆
@vvnightingale that they would offer wine instead of tea to a guest. I think people who don't drink and have fun anyways deserve praise. 👍🏻
@vvnightingale Shows how normalised drinking is now. Saw this social science experiment recently and they surveyed people and a lot said
https://t.co/4FKLfIORDK See Irish places I want go to in my new post! @thegirlganghq @FemaleBloggerRT #blogginggals https://t.co/D8Dywqat5D

Is it odd for FB to show that someone who you deleted on FB is online?
#FF to @vvnightingale @thriftyvintage_ @TT_Mirror and @lambertsmarc 👌🏻
May your choices reflect your hopes, not your fears ❤️
@MissYettyCoker @GossipBloggers Looking for a new chat to join so I'll deffo be giving it a follow!
Trying to get my shit together and get into blogging again. I've actually scheduled tweets for tomorrow and posts for Saturday and Monday!
How do you find new blog posts to read every day?
If you need a kick of motivation to get back into blogging, this post https://t.co/k6QcaONNIZ from @TT_Mirror is a good one to read!
Take me back 😥🇺🇸✈️ #throwbackthursday #tb #picoftheday #photooftheday #photography #likeforlike… https://t.co/b3wGy9pBBr
Learning a few handy social media tricks I can apply to my blog in work! 👍🏻
https://t.co/6hbRoMV5jh New update on my blog on what to expect on it in 2017! @bloggerbees #thegirlgang #lbloggers https://t.co/x4soGlNfOJ
https://t.co/HMTYgYm0Zk Going to #NYC soon? See my blogpost on things to do! #thegirlgang @thegirlganghq @BBlogRT ✈️ https://t.co/fgvX16ctaZ
@emkedwardx I know the feeling! Sometimes I wanna go red 😂
@lambertsmarc hope you're doing alright! 😊
Does anybody have any nice chilli recipes on their blogs? Would appreciate it! 😍 #foodbloggers @TheGirlGangHQ #lbloggers
#Throwback to my trip to New York City in October! Be sure to read my travel diary posted today… https://t.co/Z1jAdmoiLR
@seethestarsblog Is this a list of what's coming out in 2017 or what you wanna see?
https://t.co/hrs0BYZlTY , do you follow me on IG yet? 😘 #thegirlgang @BBlogRT @LbloggersChat @irish_blogger https://t.co/DajC3GwFof
https://t.co/bR2uFyTNkC See what I got up to in New York! 😍 #travelbloggers @thegirlganghq @bloggerbees #lbloggers https://t.co/d6iIy44fpI
@dorkfaceblog yeah it's so cool! ❤️
@dorkfaceblog totally makes me think of starry night! 😍
@ashleelizdotcom it's so weird when you're nowhere near thinking about that shit!
@thriftyvintage_ it's all set up at home! It's grand! 👍🏻 lives his life normally, goes to school etc
@thriftyvintage_ yeah! Like he's been on the tube like 2 years! And when I came home from the states I saw huge improvements in his eating!
The aim is to see a lot of Ireland I've not seen before this year! First destination was Cork!… https://t.co/5I1aWhq2aG
@thriftyvintage_ also he has cystic fibrosis so very important for him to keep up his weight!
@thriftyvintage_ my younger brother found it a chore to eat and basically stopped eating. Now he has a peg tube and eats 2 times a day!
Trying to come up with social media content for placement is actually pretty tough!
@thriftyvintage_ so happy to see you kick ocd's bum! ❤️👌🏻
Going to Cork tonight for the weekend! 😍
@lanadelcanton Agriaware. It's for my college internship for 30 weeks! 👍🏻
My job actually involves browsing through blogger's social media and heading to events. Very happy with it! 😂
@dorkfaceblog so sorry to hear of your loss! 😥
Gotten so much more confident the last 6 months! 💪🏻
@TheLippieLady the big bloggers all started somewhere too to be fair. They weren't always big 🤔
@TheLippieLady People just say that cuz of the big controversy about big bloggers like Zoella even though people had blogs b4 she was big. 😳
Can't believe I'm in full-time work for half a year starting Monday!
Used an eye shadow as contour today cause I left my everyday makeup in my dads car 😂😂
@thetartandevil @dorkfaceblog yeah that's why it's weird! They've a load of canned meats and people actually eat pop tarts for breakfast 😂
